EmailTemplate.name: ST Delivered - Collected
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for picking up your delivery for case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
StarTrack
Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!IF(ISBLANK(Contact.Preferred_Name__c),Contact.FirstName,Contact.Preferred_Name__c)},
Your delivery has been completed
Thank you for your patience while weâ€™ve been monitoring your delivery. We are delighted to see that it has now been located and collected.
If you did not collect this please check in with any friends or family who might have collected on your behalf. The vast majority of Startrack deliveries are completed on time. We're sorry that on this occasion your delivery was later than expected.
StarTrack
This email was sent by Startrack. Startrack does not represent, warrant or guarantee that the integrity of this email communication has been maintained nor that the communication is free of errors, viruses or interference.
